code:
%%{init: {'theme': 'base'}}%%
stateDiagram-v2
    [*] --> Submitted: Submit Request

    Submitted --> Analyzing: Start Workflow

    Analyzing --> Planning: Requirement Valid
    Analyzing --> Failed: Invalid Requirement

    Planning --> Generating: Plan Approved

    Generating --> PR0: Code Generated

    state PR0 {
        [*] --> Compiling
        Compiling --> Formatting: Pass
        Formatting --> Linting: Pass
        Linting --> [*]: Pass
        Compiling --> GateFailed: Fail
        Formatting --> GateFailed: Fail
        Linting --> GateFailed: Fail
    }

    PR0 --> TestGen: PR0 Pass
    PR0 --> Regenerating: PR0 Fail

    Regenerating --> Generating: Retry < Max
    Regenerating --> Failed: Retry >= Max

    TestGen --> PR1: Tests Generated

    state PR1 {
        [*] --> RunningTests
        RunningTests --> CheckingCoverage: Pass
        CheckingCoverage --> ValidatingContracts: Pass
        ValidatingContracts --> [*]: Pass
    }

    PR1 --> PR2: PR1 Pass
    PR1 --> Fixing: PR1 Fail

    Fixing --> TestGen: Fixed

    state PR2 {
        [*] --> IntegrationTests
        IntegrationTests --> SecurityScan: Pass
        SecurityScan --> PerfBaseline: Pass
        PerfBaseline --> [*]: Pass
    }

    PR2 --> EvidenceBundle: PR2 Pass

    EvidenceBundle --> Completed: Bundle Created

    Completed --> [*]
    Failed --> [*]

    note right of PR2
        PR3 (System Validation)
        planned for future phases
    end note
repo_description: Enterprise Software Factory - AI-assisted development workflows with deterministic execution, quality gates, and artifact provenance
